original_text: The boys grew up, and Esau became a skillful hunter, a man of the open country, while Jacob was content to stay at home among the tents.
korean_text: 그 아이들이 장성하매 에서는 익숙한 사냥꾼이었으므로 들사람이 되고 야곱은 조용한 사람이었으므로 장막에 거주하니

sentences.original_text: and Esau became a skillful hunter
a man of the open country
while Jacob was content to stay at home
sentences.korean_translation: 반면 야곱은 집에 머무는 것을 만족했습니다
